item.description:
Come play tennis with Raghav, John and several other collective members on Sunday Morning at the Hope High School tennis courts.  We usually start playing sometime between 9:30 and 10, and depending on how many people show up (or show up late) we play until 11 or 12.  After some of us go to the Lippet Park/Hope Artiste Farmers market, and sometimes we eat breakfast/brunch after tennis.  (The Wurst room at Chez Pascal is a Favorite, or trucks at the Farmers market.)

We have tennis players of many levels, so come out if you are at all interested.  You don't have to show up at 9.  If you show up between 10 and 11 AM, we will likely be there.  (or have posted in the comments, why we are not there.)

See you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the tennis courts next to Mt. Hope High School.
item.name: Play Tennis
